data.title: K-12 French-English Bilingual & IB Education
data.meta_description: A private day school for ages 2 through Grade 12 offering French-English bilingual and multilingual learning and the International Baccalaureate program.
data.text: At ISB, students acquire and refine the critical thinking and creative problem-solving skills to make sound decisions, the intellect to navigate different languages, and the social awareness to assimilate diverse cultures, ultimately enabling them to reason, communicate, and connect with anyone, anywhere, about virtually anything.
